Purpose of Creation.quote: "Indeed, I did not create the jinn and mankind except that they should worship Me." (Quran 51:56)

Divine Intent.quote: "For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you." (Jeremiah 29:11)

Cosmic Purpose.quote: "The purpose of creation is the mighty task of manifesting the Divine Light, Life and Love in physical form." (Sri Aurobindo)

Soul's Purpose.quote: "The soul has been given its own hearing to hear what is hidden." (Rumi)

Sacred Mission.quote: "This is the true joy in life, being used for a purpose recognized by yourself as a mighty one." (George Bernard Shaw)

Divine Will.quote: "Not my will, but yours be done." (Luke 22:42)

Spiritual Evolution.quote: "The goal of evolution is self-realization." (Paramahansa Yogananda)

Universal Purpose.quote: "Everything in the universe has a purpose. There are no mistakes, no coincidences." (Swami Sivananda)

Life's Meaning.quote: "The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away." (Pablo Picasso)

Divine Plan.quote: "In all your ways acknowledge Him, and He shall direct your paths." (Proverbs 3:6)

Spiritual Goal.quote: "The goal of spiritual practice is full human potential." (Dalai Lama)

Sacred Function.quote: "Each soul has its own particular mission in life." (Martin Buber)

Divine Direction.quote: "Your path is illuminated by the light, yet darkness lets the stars shine bright." (Rumi)

Higher Calling.quote: "Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart." (Rumi)

Eternal Purpose.quote: "From eternity to eternity I am God." (Isaiah 43:13)

Sacred Destiny.quote: "Before I formed you in the womb I knew you." (Jeremiah 1:5)

Divine Intention.quote: "God moves in a mysterious way, His wonders to perform." (William Cowper)

Spiritual Purpose.quote: "The purpose of our lives is to give birth to the best which is within us." (Marianne Williamson)

Sacred Journey.quote: "The spiritual journey is the unlearning of fear and the acceptance of love." (Marianne Williamson)

Divine Mission.quote: "Your purpose in life is to find your purpose and give your whole heart and soul to it." (Buddha)

Ultimate Goal.quote: "The ultimate goal of life is self-realization." (Ramana Maharshi)

Sacred Purpose.quote: "Your purpose is not just to do what your parents say, what your teachers say, what society says, but to find your real purpose." (Thich Nhat Hanh)

Divine Path.quote: "There are many paths to enlightenment. Be sure to take one with a heart." (Lao Tzu)

Spiritual Direction.quote: "Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love." (Rumi)

Sacred Role.quote: "You have a unique message to deliver, a unique song to sing, a unique act of love to bestow." (John Powell)

Divine Calling.quote: "Your calling is where your deepest joy meets the world's deepest need." (Frederick Buechner)

Life Purpose.quote: "The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why." (Mark Twain)

Divine Assignment.quote: "To everything there is a season, and a time to every purpose under heaven." (Ecclesiastes 3:1)

Spiritual Mission.quote: "Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart." (Carl Jung)
